name: Octofoot
description:
An arcade soccer game made in one day at Japan Addict 2016.

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

Player 1

  • Move: Arrows
  • Punch: Numpad 1
  • Bubble: Numpad 2

Player 2

  • Move: W, A, S and D
  • Punch: H
  • Bubble: J

GAMEPAD CONTROLS

  • Move: Left stick
  • Punch: A
  • Bubble: B
